title: Offering
name: Lyra
summary: The Offering, is a complex and tormented soul who stands at the forefront of battle. Driven by a morbid fascination with mortality, she shields her allies while seeking to understand the fragility of life. Her presence is both a blessing and a curse, as she endures great suffering to protect others.
history: Once a farmer's daughter, Lyra's life changed dramatically after a traumatic event involving a mysterious heart-like artifact. This experience left her with an unusual connection to the forces of life and death, driving her to join the fight against the horrors that plague the land.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

notes: A mysterious bound in a chain levitates behind her
Her arms are tied together in an unusable position
Has a deep, albeit troubling, empathy for others' suffering
